ooassignment3

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • ooassignment3.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    This class uses the actions from the user received from the views to operate the application.

      • Controller

        public Controller()

    • Method Detail

      • createCar

        public void createCar(VehicleEnum vehicleType)
        Creates a new vehicle instance specified by the enum VehicleEnum parameter and stores in the private car variable. This instance is created using a VehicleFactory
        Parameters:
        vehicleType - the type of vehicle to be created

      • getCar

        public Vehicle getCar()
        Returns the vehicle object stored in car variable.
        Returns:
        This can be a car or the "top" accessory (in a decorator pattern sense) once all the accessories have been added.

      • addGearBox

        public void addGearBox(GearBoxEnum gearBoxType)
        Creates and sets the gearbox of the car variable.
        Parameters:
        gearBoxType - the type of gear box.

      • addFuelType

        public void addFuelType(FuelTypeEnum fuelTypeEnum)
        Creates and sets the fuelType of the car variable.
        Parameters:
        fuelTypeEnum - the type of fuel.

      • addAccessory

        public void addAccessory(AccessoryEnum accessoryType)
        Adds an AccessoryEnum to the array.

        This needs to be stored as an enum because accessories require a child accessory or vehicle to be instantiated, also the decorator chain is not easily separated.

        Parameters:
        accessoryType - the type of accessory to be added.

      • removedAccessory

        public void removedAccessory(AccessoryEnum accessoryType)
        Removes an AccessoryEnum from the array.
        Parameters:
        accessoryType - the type of accessory to be removed

      • getAccessoryEnums

        public java.util.ArrayList<AccessoryEnum> getAccessoryEnums()
        Returns the ArrayList of AccessoryEnum.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of AccessoryEnum.

      • clearAccessoryEnums

        public void clearAccessoryEnums()
        Removes all AccessoryEnum from the ArrayList.

      • addAllCarAccessories

        public void addAllCarAccessories()
        Creates the decorator chain comprising of the accessories represented with AccessoryEnum in the ArrayList. Loops through the ArrayList providing the AccessoryEnum to the AccessoryAdder object Which instantiates the accessories and constructing the decorator chain. The "top" accessory is then set and stored in the private car variable.
